item.title: ‘Devil in Disguise: John Wayne Gacy’ Drops Creepy Trailer and First Look Photos (TV News Roundup)
item.description: The new crime drama series, “Devil in Disguise: John Wayne Gacy” has released its first full trailer. The series about the notorious serial killer will premiere on Peacock with all eight episodes on O
